message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation each round.
Your offer was a bit too skewed Alice. Let's find a middle ground.
Bob, my offer is still the most reasonable given the inflation. I'm losing money every round we wait!
Alice, I'm serious about finding a fairer split.  Time is running out for both of us.
Bob, I'm compromising. Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at the value!
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
